website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ XL2430T is a full-featured, midsize gaming monitor that delivers solid all-around performance, a fast pixel response, and a 144Hz refresh rate.

customer_reviews.title: Turn on the Blur-Buster feature and you will see the difference
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I didn't feel much difference to compare with my old monitor (Benq RL series 27"), until one day I found my average "successful rate of hooking" from RoadHog in Overwatch increased from 30%-ish to 61%.
customer_reviews.author: ericy

customer_reviews.title: The heavens have opened up, spreading devine light. It's the perfect 144hz gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I searched long and hard through 144hz monitors and their reviews, this model had the least complaints and issues, and was an excellent price in comparison to its competition which can be hundreds of pounds more expensive. The screen sharpness is excelent, with strong colour capabilities and fancy gimmicks for equalising darkness, blue light and such. My only issue is that anything above 10% brightness is waaaay too bright for me. It would be better to have the ability to go lower in brightness than the currant lowest. You will likely need to tweak the colours as I have since the default "profiles" provided are a bit strange, but its easy to do and the choice is great.
customer_reviews.author: DazeyDream

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy if you want to run it of a $2500 gaming laptop with a GTX 2070
customer_reviews.text: Just don't make the expensive mistake I did purchasing this monitor if you bought it for your high range gaming laptop! HDMI 1.4 and 2.0 can support 1080p at 120hz, which is what I was wanting. This monitor is capped at 60hz via hdmi. So all in all very unhappy that a gaming monitor would not come with high refresh rate options via hdmi. Monitor is bog standard gaming monitor, I have owned several different branded high refresh rate monitors including Acer, Asus and veiwsonic. Would recommend Asus or Acer over this brand for looks and quality. Ok for budgets.
customer_reviews.author: Turnoppics

customer_reviews.title: Great screen but issues with colour.
customer_reviews.text: It's great to have a 144hz monitor at this price,and the stand is fantastic for adjustment. However the factory colour settings aren't good. It takes a while to adjust the settings to suit you. The settings that I found best are: Brightness - 100 Contrast - 100 Low Blue Light - 10 Black EQ - 20 Blur Reduction Off Colour Temp User mode - R (61) G(79) B(83) Hue - 45 Colour Vibrance - 10 Sharpness - 9 Gamma - 5 Took me a while to get that to a place I wanted it, so I hope this helps for those who buy it. Otherwise great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Euan

customer_reviews.title: Simply incredible for gaming, Smashes FPS games
customer_reviews.text: Simply incredible for gaming. With a 1080ti I am able to get 240fps on most games however some more recent games like Battlefield 1 you will struggle to reach the full potential unless you lower graphics settings or overclock. I came from a 120hz screen and I can see and feel the difference that the higher refresh rate provides, just seems instant and allows you to aim very smoothly at moving targets etc. I also use this for working on, while the colour reproduction is a bit crap for photoshop or design work its not what the monitor is designed for. It's designed for one thing - gaming. Highly recommend if you want a edge on other players.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Yeats

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality monitor with excellent features.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant quality monitor with excellent features. I bought this second hand from Amazon for a brilliant price, and I am extremely pleased with the quality of this monitor. After playing games on a 45Hz monitor for 8 years, buying this was a huge leap for me and I noticed the difference both in quality of graphics and in game play, as everything was so much smoother in 240Hz! Obviously buying it second hand meant it has its fault, I have a chip in the monitor that is hardly noticeable, but other than that, highly recommend giving the BenQ Zowie a go!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor for gaming
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is great for gaming and ok for everything else. I must say I like the style of it at first I never but now I do. This monitor solved a massive gaming issue for me that I would always die in a head to head shootout I just took it on the chin and assumed they where better then me but NO it was the god dam refresh rate that one milliseconds makes all the difference! This monitor is awesome it’s smooth, good picture and couloir. The negatives the panel buttons are finicky and awkward also windows 10 setting text look strange on a white background (weird artifacting) but to solve this I just used window dark theame.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: 144hz or raw power and perfection
customer_reviews.text: As there’s a lot of different monitors I wasn’t sure what one to get. And having a Xbox one it wasn’t really to important, but il soon be changing to pc and I’m glad I have this monitor as it’s unreal and everything I wanted, all I would say it’s definitely worth getting this one and paying a little extra, rather than getting a cheaper monitor
customer_reviews.author: Dean Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great for gaming. At this price I assume it's a great choice for people who finally go from 60 fps to 144 fps, and what a difference that makes! The image is very smooth, and for games looks very nice. The monitor itself is well built and sturdy however looks bulky and outta somehow. I don't find the colours very good switching from LG 24 MP59G-P 75hz which was great for watching videos or films. The trade off is well worth it for gamers in my opinion. An ideal started 144hz monitor for gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Equinox Collection

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: Il be honest if someone had a 23 inch monitor and thinks that the 24 inch its almost the same its so wrong, its a difference. I like the monitor, its really good for the money and works really smoth. The bad part is the lighting, its really bright when comes of the boxs and the menu can be tricky because are soo many things to experiment. The design is meh, its doing its jobs. My recomandation is this, if you are ready to buy a 144hz monitor on the bugget and you dont care about the design this is a great recomandation
customer_reviews.author: antoni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this originally as a screen to play my PS4 on with the aim to upgrade to a PC at a later date. As a PS4 monitor, it is still miles better than a TV, much easier to spot enemies and really crispens up the screen (Warzone). Gameplay massively improved within the first few uses which I was not expecting just from a monitor. Whilst playing Ghost of Tsushima, this is when it came into its own providing some visually stunning scenes, the colours displayed are incredible. Unable to comment yet on use with a PC, but considering I will have 80 more Hz to play with, I don't doubt I will be as impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Washed out - not suitable for work
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried this monitor for gaming. I bought it because I liked the size and the ability to rotate it 90 degrees. In fact I bought two of them at the same time, to go on either side of my main monitor. "A monitor's a monitor" I thought" -- evidently I'm wrong I'm really disappointed, the screen settings are awful as shipped, and it took a lot of internet research and fiddling to get a reasonable image on one of them - the other one is just awful and will be going back if I can find a box suitable for shipping it. It's just painful to read ordinary black-on-white text.
customer_reviews.author: David Hampton

customer_reviews.title: 240 frames of wow
customer_reviews.text: I play pubg at around 160 fps and fortnight runs 200 plus, the difference from a 60 herts panel is night and day. I seem to play better and not having screen tear is so much nicer to look at. It looks excellent also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Colours, Gamma Contrast and Brightness
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this monitor. For gaming, this monitor is superb. Everything ticks all the boxes. On the desktop however, that is a different story. The screen is too bright to the point where it hurts my eyes, so I try to replicate my previous monitor colour and brightness etc. But the monitor is too green, too bright, and I spent 4 hours trying to adjust everything to make it look right but it just wasn't possible.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. My step son says it’s a huge upgrade to his previous monitor. Resolution is great, be sure to see previous reviews for tips on how to set it up as we followed them and set the quality up fine. Remember to change the settings in the display settings on windows to 144hz as it stays on 60hz unless you change it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: This is a gamers paradise for a monitor
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say about this product. As a gamer I was looking at utilising the 240hz with the 240 FPS cap. Needless to say this monitor is a beast but the settings can be confusing to first setup as the hdmi ports mixed with an legato capture card can prove very tricky for pc recording. Alas I got there and it has been beautiful ever since especially for graphics. Very happy with this purchase would recommend it to any gamer. youtuber SYN3RGY YouTube (verified real review)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For gamers. Match ur fps to 240hz and ur good
customer_reviews.text: Gaming wise is great. Colours as for TN are good, better than my previous screen. Has 240hz, but due games limitation in frames I am using tweaked 144hz with dyac on. Black is blueish(standard...) but is better than IPS glow. Have some uniformity issues but can see it on black only, so no problem here for me. We desperately need OLED or microled, this type of screen are just too crappy and expensive for what they offer...
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good image quality
customer_reviews.text: I adjusted the contrast to full and the image matched my laptops screen (asus rog gl553ve). It is a tn pannel so very fast refresh rate (1ms). Very adjustable. My laptop however does not support the cable it came with so i used a hdmi cable of my own as the monitor also supports hdmi as well as dp. Hdmi however caps you at 60hz i believe. The monitor also has a aux jack for you to plug in your headphones and once connected to pc or laptop, its easy to find and select as main audio drive. I would recommend for the price. Benq is a very trusted brand for gaming, especially in the CSGO factor for esports. GG
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming on a budget!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor for the money, considering you can pay in excess of £300 for some 144hz monitor this is an absolute steal as it still provides a brilliant overall gaming experience and an amazing picture (with a little bit of tweaking in the settings). Would recommend to anyone looking for a great 144hz experience!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Hind

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: Best Monitor I have owned. As you take it out the box. (contents packed super well) it fits together in seconds, very easy to adjust height of the screen and angle. looks great with or without the side blinds. when gaming I notice the differences, its much better, brighter game play...
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reacher

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: I play competitive Overwatch and recently upgraded from a 144hz Acer Predator. Some may say that the jump to 240hz isn't as noticeable. It's hard to say and maybe it's the placebo effect. My accuracy on dps has gone up a solid 5-10% so I'm pretty satisfied. Yeah it's a tn panel and yeah the colors look like hot garbage straight out the box, but it's worth the time to calibrate the settings to your liking. Zowie products have always been a little pricy but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: I'm told by gamer son that its great
customer_reviews.text: Colour rendition is frankly odd but the pixel response rate is great (according to hardcore gaming son). If that is your prime concern this appears to be a good value step up before you go bonkers on faster GPU's. Solid rotatable stand is a surprising and useful bonus (esp if you are in a multi-display environment),
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey T.

customer_reviews.title: Competitive gaming and that's all there is to this monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: Competitive gaming and that's all there is to this monitor. From World of Warcraft PvP to Counter-Strike if you have the machine to never drop 240 fps in a fight you are in for a treat ! Rated 4 stars cause my panel came with 2 dead pixel next to each other. Other notes: DISPLAY PORT is included , they fail to mention in description so i ordered 1 just in case. If you are new to this type of gaming monitors try to switch from fps 1 mode to standard monitor settings cause at first impression you'l be blinded as it come in fps 1 setup.
customer_reviews.author: FirstOne

customer_reviews.title: Had to return. Awful.
customer_reviews.text: The image on this monitor was so underwhelming I had to return it. The colours were so washed out I actually spent several hours playing around with settings and reviewing peoples recommended settings but just gave up in the end. I've used two other monitors with the PC it was connected to and the picture and colours were fine, even using standard settings. Save your money/time spent returning the item and look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: MrRf

customer_reviews.title: Technical details are wrong
customer_reviews.text: The technical details of the product are inaccurate. The maximum display resolution is NOT 2560 x 1440 as stated, but is it 1920 x 1080. The BENQ Zowie range are excellent with very quick response time etc etc but the much cheaper versions will reach 2560 x 1440 at 144 Hz. So ONLY buy this version if the 240Hz refresh rate is more important to you than the resolution. Dont be put off the BENQ Zowie range though - they are great monitors. Here's hoping the Hermes return process is simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor great colouring and refresh response. Blackness Equaliser is just amazing. Playing games like "DayZ" at night is just completely fine on this as the special setting on the monitor makes everything dark look like it was day time again without altering colours or messing with alpha at all. It just removes the darkness. Great for FPS games or games that you struggle to see in shadows on. Completely stunned me I was so impressed with it. Great value for money and great build quality. Detail is amazing as it even displays 2k res. It is supposed to be 1080 but has a max output of 1440p. Well done Zowie as always.
customer_reviews.author: Steanford

customer_reviews.title: Fast monitor
customer_reviews.text: top monitor the best one ive had good for FPS games and goes perfect with my set up happy man ;)
customer_reviews.author: FARTMAN

customer_reviews.title: good monitor, 240hz... very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: the side flaps are optional fit, i left mine off. Works as it says, quality screen, 240hz excellent gaming monitor. Colours are good once configured!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: 1.2 display port cable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor as a starting monitor as I had heard good reviews about it and it runs 144hz with 1ms overall great monitor for gaming, streaming and watching media. The only reason I am giving this monitor a three star rating is because it comes with an older 1.2 display port cable not a 1.4 my rx 590 graphics card was not compatible with this so I had to buy a 1.4 off of amazon. After that inconvenience it all ran well.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good Budget Monitor but clunky and has an issue with Brightness
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor with a my 2060 super at High on nearly every game and encounter few issues. The main gripes i have with it are the size and design of the monitor which overall is not stellar - its pretty clunky and looks it. Also the monitor is exceptionally bright so be prepared to have your retina's burned out of your skull when first turning it on... however as a budget monitor it works perfectly (I now use it as my second monitor)
customer_reviews.author: MysteryG

customer_reviews.title: Poor colours, excellent refresh rate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for its cheap price and 144hz refresh rate. It's amazing to finally experience 144hz, albeit the colours are not amazing. Black equalizer is weird so I recommend turning that off completely. It may be worth your time to buy a colour checker in addition to this monitor, as the colour calibration is incredibly poor when you get it out of the box. After half an hour of adjustments I was able to get it somewhat correct by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Euan_H

customer_reviews.title: Come damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for gaming but came with a bad fault probably damaged in transit as box was heavily scuffed contacted benq who advised me that light bleed was unacceptable so unfortunately returned Had a 2nd one come and the picture quality was just poor no matter what you do setting wise constantly looks really blurry had to send 2nd one back avoid this monitor
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: For sure when I turned it on it didn’t look perfect. It’s because of the different technology used for this monitor. After a brief search on Reddit I found the perfect display settings. For the price the Monitor is really good value. For me the absolute plus that it is adjustable in height.
customer_reviews.author: Jack OC

customer_reviews.title: For Pros
customer_reviews.text: I'll just get straight to the point, in my opinion it's one of the if not the best 240hz e sports monitor, most csgo/ow pros use this monitor and for a good reason, it's amazing, dy-ac is not snake oil but actually really good in fast paced moments, overall out of ten I'd rate this monitor on a 9,the only thing i dont like is that it's a TN panel so yeah colors are not the best but for a TN it's a good TN
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Dilenardo

customer_reviews.title: A lot better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early with no problems. No issues setting it up and the monitor itself is definently a good deal for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Very poor colour
customer_reviews.text: The colour that this monitor has is very poor. The display is ridiculously bright with all colour looking very faint. Even by looking at other reviews and copying settings they suggested it still gives off very poor pictures. Ignoring the colour, the picture itself is very clear with very sharp images and a nice size and refresh rate. The price itself is great for a cheap monitor with these specs so if you dont mind the faint colour then this is a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my ps4 (I know, overkill). Use it for competitive games such as Apex Legends and really notice a difference compared to using a TV. Only negative is that it arrived with a dent / scratch in the screen (only 4mm long, not a big deal but it’s meant to be new).
customer_reviews.author: Pip

customer_reviews.title: Ok so you like to game? You're not going to get better than this monitor for this price.
customer_reviews.text: There is no arguing with the facts, for the money and at this time stamp (8/4/20), there is simply no monitor out there that can compete with this. I did a lot of research on monitors before upgrading to this one and it was worth while. Unless you want you monitor to be exceptionally flashy with a sleek design (in which case you will be paying a lot more for the same quality), this monitor is for you. It is very simple and clean, sturdy support, nice raisable mount, can be completely rotated 180 degrees, settings are very easy to use. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant... If you use display port.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor, only downside is that its capped at 60hz when using HDMI 1.4, which is a shame as my current set up doesn't have a display port. Docking 1 star as this wasn't obviously mentioned in any of the product's description.
customer_reviews.author: Barnie Tucker

customer_reviews.title: 144hz is great, but the colors are awful!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly fine, but the colors truly are poor! Even on max saturation the colors dont pop properly. I suppose it’s the price you pay for the more budget gaming monitor but still, really bummed about that. (When I say the colors are poor, I mean, ur current 60hz monitor 100% has better color than this!) Colors aside, the monitor is brilliant. Straight out the box, plug in 2 wires and that’s it. 144hz looks AMAZING. No complaints there!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant
customer_reviews.text: This is my first high refresh rate experience and I LOVE IT you can use the monitor portrait too and adjust the height swivel and angle and it has a perfect 180° viewing angle, really you only notice colour change from underneath which is negligible and the 1ms response time makes the 144 frames feel that bit more clean and smooth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gaming and work monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought the benq zowie for my son for christmas and he thinks it has a very good gaming quality and very good picture quality when doing college work. Would reccomend. Arrived well packed and on the date it said it would, so very pleased about that!

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING

The screen quality is meh but I find after a couple of hours you will become adjusted. This screen is great for competitive gaming since the refresh rate is 144hz, trust me once you try 144hz you will not be able to go back to 60hz. ITS SO SMOOTH!!!!
